   18: import dns.immutable
   19: import dns.rdtypes.dnskeybase  # lgtm[py/import-and-import-from]
   20: 
   21: # pylint: disable=unused-import
   22: from dns.rdtypes.dnskeybase import (  # noqa: F401  lgtm[py/unused-import]
   23:     REVOKE,
   24:     SEP,
   25:     ZONE,
   26: )
   27: 
   28: # pylint: enable=unused-import
   29: 
   30: 
   31: @dns.immutable.immutable
   32: class DNSKEY(dns.rdtypes.dnskeybase.DNSKEYBase):
   33:     """DNSKEY record"""
